metadata.title: CVE-2021-28831 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
decompress_gunzip.c in BusyBox through 1.32.1 mishandles the error bit onthe huft_build result pointer, with a resultant invalid free orsegmentation fault, via malformed gzip data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-28831` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

busybox - 1:1.27.2-2ubuntu3.4
busybox-initramfs - 1:1.27.2-2ubuntu3.4
busybox-static - 1:1.27.2-2ubuntu3.4
busybox-syslogd - 1:1.27.2-2ubuntu3.4
udhcpc - 1:1.27.2-2ubuntu3.4
udhcpd - 1:1.27.2-2ubuntu3.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: busybox package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.27.2-2ubuntu3.4').
